text: Alikadam Cantonment () is a cantonment located outside of Bandarban. The 24th Infantry Division (Bangladesh) inhabits the cantonment. It is one of five cantonment in Chittagong Hill Tracts area. == See also == * Comilla Cantonment * Mymensingh Cantonment * Savar Cantonment == References == Category:Cantonments of Bangladesh
title: Alikadam Cantonment
